name: Ollenbock Escort
originalText:
Vigilance
Sacrifice Ollenbock Escort: Target creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn.

rulings.text: The creature having a +1/+1 counter on it is part of the targeting requirement of Ollenbock Escort's ability. After the ability has resolved, the creature won't lose lifelink or indestructible if the counter goes away.
